title: How to Rejuvenate Potted Succulents Quickly

steps.headline: Push some plant or sheep pellets down the side of each potted succulent.
steps.description: Push down as much as your fingers can go.

steps.headline: Leave for a few more months.
steps.description: During this time, the added nutrients leaching from the pellets will give the succulents that added boost that they need to keep going until you get around to re potting them.

steps.headline: Replant when you can.
steps.description: Eventually the goodness from the pellets will disappear and you will need to re pot the succulents. Do so at your soonest convenience.

text: Push some plant or sheep pellets down the side of each potted succulent. Push down as much as your fingers can go. Water well.  Leave for a few more months. During this time, the added nutrients leaching from the pellets will give the succulents that added boost that they need to keep going until you get around to re potting them. Replant when you can. Eventually the goodness from the pellets will disappear and you will need to re pot the succulents. Do so at your soonest convenience.
